verbose_text: Administration of Escherichia coli LPS into the rat jejunum causes vagal afferent input to the nucleus of the solitary tract as does intraperitoneal injection of interleukin-1beta or tumour necrosis factor-alpha.
evidence: LPS into the rat jejunum causes vagal afferent input to the nucleus of the solitary tract               as does intraperitoneal injection of interleukin-1beta or tumour necrosis
